item.description:
OK, so it's not on Halloween night   But it's darn close. And the location is definitely haunted. Investigators have identified at least a half dozen spirits by name, and we know there are more. We have investigated at this location multiple times and have always collected lots of evidence: EVP, photos, and ghost box sessions, not to mention K2 and flashlight activity, disembodied voices, touches, and more. To hear just a couple of  responses from a recent ghost box session, follow these links:
http://soundcloud.com/jonimayhan/red-room-women-only-why-you
http://soundcloud.com/jonimayhan/red-room-remember-edwin-hi

The mansion has also been the subject of two "Ghost Hunters" investigations. Here's a link to one of them. The owners have also been on "My Ghost Story." Needless to say, this is a truly haunted location!

If you haven't been on an investigation yet, this is a great time to get your feet wet! Members of the MA branch of New England GHOST, our parent organization, will be there to lead teams throughout the mansion, conduct EVP sessions and spirit box sessions, and let people use our investigation equipment.  If you've been there before and would love an opportunity to return, this event is for you!

This event is limited to 20 people because of the space contraints of the location. We will have access to all three floors, the basement, and the turret.  Everyone will have an opportunity to investigate all of these locations.

The cost is $25/per person, payable in advance through PayPal. In the unlikely event that this meetup is canceled (remember the snow last Oct.?), I will refund your money through PayPal to you. No refunds if you sign up and then can't make it though. Sorry.

All the proceeds from this event, less the expenses for food and coffee, will go toward the restoration of this historic property.

We will be serving pizza around 9pm. We'll also have coffee, donuts, and an assortment of Halloween goodies available.

Hope to see you there!

 

P.S.

Here are a few photos from previous investigations of the mansion.
item.how_to_find_us: Located at 4 West Broadway in Gardner, MA
item.name: Halloween Investigation at a Haunted Victorian Mansion
